author: Xerbutri
title: Petroleum Zuid
intro: We visited this industrial area in February 2007. This visit had a kind of infiltration-style. One of the team members wanted to climb the oil storage vessels. So we threw him out of the car and had a rendez-vous on a shunting yard. He didn't get busted.
history: Around 1900 the first petrol activities took place in this area. In the sixties these activities moved north to the new harbours. The area will be abandoned soon. After a huge clean up a new residential area will be built.
